FuncDef:
The mpls traffic-statistics command globally enables MPLS traffic statistics collection and creates the traffic statistics view.
The undo mpls traffic-statistics command globally disables MPLS traffic statistics collection and deletes the traffic statistics view.
This function is disabled by default.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
LDP traffic statistics collection enables users to query and monitor LDP LSP traffic in real time.
To globally enable MPLS traffic statistics collection and create the traffic statistics view, run the mpls traffic-statistics command.
Prerequisites
MPLS has been enabled globally using the mpls command.
